posts.post_content:
Wanted Dead or Alive

Whilst many of the players represented on America’s Toughest Want List are long deceased, the record prices we are prepared to pay for pristine examples of these American heroes will enable our sellers to “enjoy the good life.”

As America’s most discriminating type card collector, we seek the best examples extant of players and team cards from the series listed below. 

Please write in confidence (with scans) to Bruce Dorskind
[url]bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com[/url]

America’s Toughest Want List
Where Quality Never Goes Out of Style

N162 Goodwin’s Champions
N 175 Large Gypsy Queen
N 370 Lone Jack
N 403 Yum Yum
T 208 Fireside
T 216 Kotton Tobacco
Darby Chocolate Box
Texas Tommy Type 1 and Type 2
E 103 Williams

posts.post_title: and one more for the road...
posts.post_content:
We (well, me) are going to head this one off at the pass. I will kindly ask Bruce to wait at least a month before posting his wants in any BST section again. Lets make it easy and say October 1st......This thread is being locked as it is radioactive....

Bruce- you are welcome to email me about this but you really should trust me that I am on your side about most stuff....Just let it go....
